name: Pulsetron
description: Pulsetron is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a unique design. It has a sturdy box-shaped body, resembling a cat, and is equipped with soldier-like buttons that control its various functions. Its arms and legs are in the position of a hand down, giving it a confident and ready-to-action posture. The screen of Pulsetron is a striking combination of red and black colors, adding to its mysterious allure.
